oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Indirekte Selektionmethoden auf Methioninreichtum des Samenproteins bei heimischen Leguminosen
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Schumacher, H.
Paulsen, Hans Marten
Gau , A. E.
Link, W.
Jürgens, H.-U.
Sass, O.
Dieterich, R:
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Cereals, pulses and oilseeds
Breeding, genetics and propagation
Knowledge management
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: While grain legumes can be regarded as highly valuable protein sources for animal nutrition, ceratin drawbacks inhibit their use as sole foodstuff for livestock. The nutrient quality is reduced by low concentrations of tryptophan and sulfur amino acids.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Schumacher, H.; Paulsen, Hans Marten; Gau , A. E.; Link, W.; Jürgens, H.-U.; Sass, O. and Dieterich, R: (2011) Indirekte Selektionmethoden auf Methioninreichtum des Samenproteins bei heimischen Leguminosen. [Indirect selection methods on high methionine content of seed protein in domestic legumes.] Paper at: 11. Wissenschaftstagung Ökologischer Landbau, Gießen, 16.-18. März 2011.
